body_content.explanation: the capital city of the Republic of Ireland, situated in the northeast of the country, on the coast:
examples: A huge crowd greeted the team back in Dublin.
New York, Dublin, Paris, Frankfurt and Amsterdam were favourite destinations.

body_content.explanation: an area of the northeast of the Republic of Ireland that was a county (= an area with its own local government) until 1994:
examples: The Magdalene Sisters is set in Dublin county in 1964.
She was brought up in County Dublin and educated at a convent school.
